briefTitle: The OLYMPUS Study - Optimized DeLivery of Mitomycin for Primary UTUC Study
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Multicenter Trial Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of UGN-101 on Ablation of Upper Urinary Tract Urothelial Carcinoma
conditions: Transitional Cell Carcinoma of Renal Pelvis
summary: The study is investigating the ability of UroGen's UGN-101 to treat urothelial carcinoma tumors from the upper urinary tract.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Primary Efficacy Endpoint Was the Number of Patients Attaining Complete Response (CR) at the End of the Treatment Period (PDE Visit).
